p: Rhizomes of the species Cyperus articulatus var. nodosus, popularly known as priprioca, were collected in August 2014, in the Tabocal region of the municipality of Santarém, Pará, Brazil (−54°43’00.10” W −02°37’41.10” S). The species was identified by the botanist Dr. Antônio Elielson Sousa da Rocha, from the Museu Paraense Emilio Goeldi, where a specimen is deposited (MG-207174). The plant’s name was verified on the online website ( www.theplantlist.org) of the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, accessed on July 7, 2020.
